message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation cost
My turn to propose a split. Given the inflation, this favors you slightly less than your previous offer favored me.
Considering the increased inflation cost for both of us, I've adjusted my offer slightly. This should still be more favorable to me, but also slightly better for you compared to my first offer.
This is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. Any more rounds and inflation will eat into both our shares.
